title: League randomly "Freezing"
body:
Starting just today...

At random moments in a game everything I try to do gets completely ignored for 1 or 2 seconds. For example, I can be clicking to move somewhere or to cast my abilities and the guy just stands still and does nothing.

Or if I have a move command somewhere and it does this freeze then he'll continue to just move forward regardless of any action given to him for like 1 or 2 seconds.

Ping at constant 40 and FPS at constant 200+.

I restarted my computer, and now I'm thinking about reinstalling League to see if that does anything. Just started happening today and it happens every game. I haven't played ranked yet, just normals. Is this happening to anyone else?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing packet loss or extreme packet buffering. My recommended next step is to work through [our connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common causes of this issue.

Let me know if this works for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LB7kyTAX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-07T18:35:26.789+0000)

> It sounds like you're experiencing packet loss or extreme packet buffering. My recommended next step is to work through [our connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common causes of this issue.

> Let me know if this works for you.

thanks mang, will do.
